date: Mon Mar 28 2022 22:36:05 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
keywords: Jessica Chastain,The Eyes of Tammy Faye,Tammy Faye
description: Jessica Chastain has won the Academy Award for best lead actress for her mascara-laden title role as the on-air preaching partner and wife of Christian televangelist Jim Bakker. The Oscar triumph follows a Screen Actors Guild Award for her performance and capped the third Academy Award nomination of her career. The actress, 45, has said she spent several hours a day on set in the makeup chair having facial prosthetics applied.

Chastain overtook a stacked category to win her first Oscar for 'The Eyes of Tammy Faye.'
